name: Unlikable Hero
description:
Oh no! It seems like the whole village has finally found a way to kick you out-

A mighty vilain rose up and someone has to take care of it! No chosen one was found, so the village decided to send you instead hoping you'll fail and die.

Try to prove them wrong as you progress through a platformer 2D game, where villagers tries to murder you.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Ark-Ange: Coding, Level Design

Neptunia: 2D artist, Animator

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This little project was done in the span of 3 weeks for a game jam we were assigned. The game is far from finished, and still hosts many bugs, but we still hope you'll enjoy it.
